column5: Good luck to those chasing muskie this weekend. I had a lot of hits while fishing for walleye over the last month, hint hint... Maybe I can get a couple jigs back this weekend!  Have a look at this Tiger Musky, I was lucky enough to land this yesterday. Caught it on a hair jig with 20 lb power pro braid, not even a nick in the braid.    Cheers & Tight Lines!  @http://twitter.com/RedsFishin
Beautiful colors on those Tigers, thanks for posting that picture !!
I want to catch one of those. Very nice fish. Congrats
WOW, those colours are gorgeous on that fish.  Joey
Nice fish! Gotta love the pattern on the hybrids. Congrats on a great looking catch!
That is an amazing looking fish.  Congrats!
What a beautiful fish! Thanks for the picture.
Dang that sure is a great looking Tiger the color is great Hope to find one of them this year.
would these potentially be in any body of water where pike and muskie co-exist?
Man, that fish rivals a brookie for looks!

Yes, especially if pike have recently invaded or been introduced to a lake that has traditionally been a muskie lake.  It does not seem to happen as often in lakes where pike and muskie have co-existed for a long time.
Beautiful and well defined lines on that fish.  Very Nice and Congrats.
